attributes.review: this nasty🤮crusty🤮musty🤮dusty🤮icky🤮disgusting piece of GARBAGE created an even crustier🤢mustier🤢dustiest🤢ickiest🤢app so i just HAD to download to see how bad it was. MY EXPECTATIONS WERE LOW AND THIS APP SOMEHOW STILL DID NOT MEET THEM. anywayssss don’t get it y’all bc mans is racist and a psychopath😳 and a SEXUAL😵 ASSAULTER. this app also murdered my puppy and destroyed my mother’s vision bc of how ugly cheeto🤡bunker boy is. anyways pleasepleasepleasepleasepleasepleaseeee help us put trump in jail so that nobody else’s puppy gets murdered and no one else’s mother looses her vision🥺🤧
attributes.title: NO BUENOOOO - WORST APP I HAVE EVER USED

attributes.review:
Hi this is taehyung’s left hand and let me just say I never want to see this on my phone it should be deleted and removed from online stores it’s inappropriate for any age group and invites toxic behavior this app can be destructive to millions of people not only in the US but around the world I want this off the App Store 

Thank you Apple for your time, 
Please let me know when it gets taken off so I can be happy again
attributes.title: Ugly Cheeto dust

attributes.review: I opened the app and after being on it for 2 seconds it kicked me out so I decided to shut off my phone and re open it and the app started glitching when I was on it so after trying to fix the problem I gave up because it wouldn’t even let me buy anything or do much if I opened it at random times it would kick me out and the glitches were so bad
attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.review: I downloaded this app with absolutely no hope for anything decent. Fortunately, I was correct. Not once did I open the app but by just clicking the button to install, I immediately started hearing the sounds of airplanes flying over and sirens wailing. The universe became imbalanced by my actions. I apologize for my heinous crime 😔. I can still hear the screaming of children at night.
attributes.title: 🎶Just did a gooooood thing 🎶 1/5 wish it could be 0/5

attributes.review: This app crashed my phone and made me cry. I don’t understand why they allow anything to become an app. I cannot believe that people use this to willingly get fake news. I WANT MY MONEY BACK(even though I didn’t pay for this nonsense) I feel like I should hey something back. Anyways how is everyone doing? It’s been pretty rainy by me but that’s probably because this app exists. Have a great day
attributes.title: This app made my phone crash

attributes.review: I get this app, my family and I curious to find what might be lurking in the dark waters, and we get absolutely shaken to the core when we find some CHEETO popping up on the screen. We all were terrified and scarred from seeing that nasty being. It continued to talk and talk, constantly trying to brainwash us. Definitely not worth downloading ever again. I'm not going to let my family suffer any longer.
attributes.title: Absolutely terrifying

attributes.review: This app is a complete waste of space just like Trump himself ✨ First of all the app doesn’t work and it took up a crappy amount of storage 😔💅 And when I downloaded it a cheeto puff started attacking me which I’m pretty sure was trumps newborn child 👁👄👁  Anyways I hates Donald Trump to begin with and that racist rat’s newborn attacked me and placed a trump 2020 sign on my window 😣😣 So if you continue to support this man you should delete yourself just like the app 🤩🤩
attributes.title: ✨🥰 𝓯𝓾𝓬𝓴 𝓽𝓻𝓾𝓶𝓹 🥰✨

attributes.review: terrible terrible TERRIBLE app! Within seconds my phone crashed RIP then whenever I tried to delete it there was a screeching noise that emitted from my phone, it killed my fish Roby, double RIP 😭 I had to explain to my parents why my fish died and was also now spasming. It flopped onto my dads eye and we took him to the infirmary where he was pronounced dead at 2:47 am, triple RIP ☠️. Never did I think one app could cause this much damage DO NOT INSTAL IT
attributes.title: NEVER AGAIN

attributes.review: upon trying to download it took forever! and once i opened the app i was completely disappointed. It was a black screen! I waited a few minutes because i still had hope.. but then it was even more disappointing because it started playing a stupid song and it wouldnt stop. I don’t know what funny business this app is trying but it is unacceptable!
attributes.title: worst app ever!

attributes.review: the one time that i met mr donald j trump i was with my 3 month old baby sister. he asked me if i had his app and i said no. because of that answer he grabbed my baby sister out of her stroller and threw her as hard as he could into a near by pond. i had to jump into the pond fully clothed and swim to save my sister. and when i got out of the water with my baby sister in hand he proceeded to spit on us both and called us a derogatory term.
attributes.title: Trump threw my baby sister
